audit:record.audit:justification: Purged datastream using Islandora API . . . Purged datastream (ID=ISLANDORACM), versions ranging from 2010-09-13T13:13:19.112Z to the end of time. This resulted in the permanent removal of 3 datastream version(s) (2010-09-13T13:13:19.112Z, 2010-09-13T13:13:28.027Z, 2010-09-13T13:13:37.991Z) and all associated audit records.

foxml:datastreamVersion.LABEL: Dublin Core Record for this object

element.label: Ingest File
element.name: ingest-file-location
element.description: Please select a file to ingest.

element.label: Title
element.name: mods_title
element.description: A descriptive title of the object.

element.label: Identifier
element.name: mods_identifier
element.description: Please enter a standard number assigned to the resource. This field is optional, as an identifier in the Handle system will be automatically assigned.

element.label: Format
element.name: mods_format
element.description: Choose the format of the original item that was digitized.

element.label: Description
element.name: mods_description
element.description: A summary of the content of the resource.

element.label: Rights
element.name: mods_rights
element.description: Information about intellectual property rights, copyright, and various property rights.

element.label: Note
element.name: mods_note
element.description: Add a note about the digital object.

element.label: Subject(s)
element.name: subject
element.description: * At least one subject is required. Please expand the appropriate fieldset(s) below and fill in the necessary information.

element.label: Spatial
element.name: subject][place
element.description: Is the digital object about a place? If yes, then fill in to the most specific level that the object is about.

element.label: Temporal
element.name: subject][time
element.description: Is the digital object about a time? If yes then fill in to the most specific level that the object is about.

element.label: Person
element.name: subject][person
element.description: Is the digital object about a person? If yes then please include:

element.label: Topic
element.name: subject][topic
element.description: Is the digital object about a thing?

element.label: Topics
element.name: subject][topic][mods_topics
element.description: Please enter a semicolon separated list of topics, or enter then one at a time and press enter between each.

element.label: Authority
element.name: subject][topic][mods_topicAuthority
element.description: Please select the authority from which the terms below originate.

element.label: Title
element.name: subject][title
element.description: Is the digital object about another title?

element.label: Title
element.name: subject][title][mods_subjtitle
element.description: The other title that this object is about.

element.label: Language(s)
element.name: mods_language
element.description: Please identify the language(s) of the resource. Find as you type.

element.label: Entities
element.name: mods_people
element.description: Please enter a list of entities that are related to this object by the specified roles.

element.label: Physical Location
element.name: physlocation
element.description: Physical location of the object.

element.label: Shelf Locator
element.name: physlocation][mods_shelfLocator
element.description: optional. eg Archives Number.

element.label: Publication/Origin Information
element.name: pubinfo
element.description: Enter information if applicable about the publication/release/copyright of the original (not the digitized) object.

element.label: Journal Frequency
element.name: pubinfo][mods_pubinfo_journalFreq
element.description: The frequency that this journal is published. (Leave blank for monographic issuance).
